entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrate Collation Fails #26092
  • Call base in skipped tests #26088
  • Custom SQL translation for bool-returning function #26084
  • Benchmarks: use context pooling (almost) everywhere #26083
    MQ

Closed

  • Many-to-Many does not get updated for replaced entity with shared primary key #24123
    6.0.0-rc2
  • EF6 RC1: Many to many scaffolding results in model building errors (runtime) #26086
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Improve exception for One-to-many from Keyless Entity Type #24283
    6.0.0
  • 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10: Navigations can only target entity types with keys #26073
    6.0.0
  • Many-to-many with surrogate key and change tracker causes FK violation #24466
    6.0.0
  • EF Core Cosmos: Owned Embedded id property not persisted #25232
  • EF Core Issues with Owned Types in multiple Many-To-Many Relationships between two entities #25224
    6.0.0
  • .NET 6 RC1 - Migrations not going through/code-first not updating database #26063
  • Scaffold-DbContext in EF Core results are different from models from edmx ( using Database first approach) #26060
  • Always encrypted numeric column is considered as decimal #25932
  • Precompiling models and missing usings #25812
  • [RC1] Invalid migrations snapshot generated for key Fluent APIs #26045
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Indicate in OnConfigure if the DbContext if a Migration is being created. #25981
  • WHY NOT VIEWS !?!? #26072
  • how to replace SqlServer SqlServerUpdateSqlGenerator with my own custom implementation? #26019
  • Connection Resilience with Cross Context Transaction while using same sql connection. #25987

PullRequests

Created

  • ModelBuilding: Add regression test for #18149 #26096
  • [6.0] Always store join table schema in the snapshot. #26095
  • Tools: Check for unsupported OS-specific TFMs #26094
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26093
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Fix update pipeline perf regression #26082

Merged

  • Add regression test for HasMany on keyless entity #26091
  • [6.0] ModelBuilding: Check for navigation compatibility with keyless type w… #26090
  • [6.0-rc2] RevEng: Generate correct FK configuration for scaffolding #26087
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Fixup deleted join entities #26036
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26075
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.20.1 to 3.21.0 #26001
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Code Cleanup for EFCore project #25350
  • [6.0-rc2] Fully support int identity seed #26066
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Adding grouping tests from EF6 #26069
  • [6.0] Fix to #24490 - Update exception message when correlated collection cannot be projected #26079
